C

ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.drivers - package ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.drivers
This package contains all drivers that take the robot from point A to point B.
ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.localization - package ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.localization
This package contains classes dedicated to localizing the robot using environmental cues.
ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.odometry - package ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.odometry
This package contains all odometry related classes.
ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.robot - package ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.robot
This package contains the main class, a helper class, the game setup class and the display class.
ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.sensing - package ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.sensing
This package includes all classes that interact with sensors that are part of odometry or localization.
ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.strategy - package ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.strategy
This package contains game strategy and logic.
colorData - Variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.sensing.FlagDetection
Buffer array for the color sensor data.
colorMapping - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.sensing.FlagDetection
Color mapping from sensor return values (index) to server color values (element).
colorSampler - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.localization.LightLocalizer
Sample provider for the color sensor.
colorSampler - Variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.sensing.FlagDetection
Sample provider for the color sensor.
convertAngle(double, double, double) - Static method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.robot.Helper
This method converts a change in heading to a rotation amount to be requested to the motors.
convertDistance(double, double) - Static method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.robot.Helper
This method converts a distance to a rotation amount to be requested to the motors.
convertToFourCorners(int, int, int, int) - Static method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.robot.Helper
Converts a pair of "upper right-lower left" coordinates to a list of coordinates representing the four corners of a rectangular area.
counter - Variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.localization.LightLocalizer
Counts the number of lines detected during sweep operation.
currentDistance - Variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.localization.UltrasonicLocalizer
Distance in cm, as measured by the ultrasonic sensor.
